name: Cactus
description: Cacti are succulent plants adapted to arid climates.

name: Daffodil
description: Daffodils are cheerful spring flowers with trumpet-like blooms.

name: Daisy
description: Daisies are simple yet charming flowers often associated with innocence.

name: Lavender
description: Lavender is a fragrant herb used in aromatherapy and cooking.

name: Lily
description: Lilies are known for their elegance and come in various colors.

name: Orchid
description: Orchids are exotic flowers with intricate and diverse appearances.

name: Rose
description: The rose is a classic flower symbolizing love and beauty.

name: Sunflower
description: Sunflowers are large, bright flowers that follow the sun.

name: Tulip
description: Tulips are popular spring flowers with vibrant colors.

name: Jasmine
description: Jasmine flowers are prized for their sweet fragrance.

name: Carnation
description: Carnations are popular for their ruffled appearance and wide range of colors.

name: Violet
description: Violets are small and delicate flowers often associated with modesty and simplicity.
